1.text: Combine the clear glue and room-temperature water in a large bowl.

2.text: Mix the Borax powder and warm water together in a separate bowl.

3.text: Combine the glue mixture and the Borax solution.

4.text: Keep stirring the mixture until all of the liquid is absorbed.

5.text: Knead the slime until it reaches your preferred consistency.

6.text: Play with your slime or store it in an airtight container until it gets clear.

7.text: Put the clear glue into a large bowl.

8.text: Combine the water and baking soda in a separate bowl.

9.text: Pour the baking soda solution into the bowl with the glue.

10.text: Stir 2 tablespoons (30 ml) of saline solution into the mixture.

11.text: Knead the slime with your hands until the liquid is absorbed.

12.text: Play with the slime or store it in an airtight container.
